title: Each one of us is a man or woman, sitting behind a keyboard, staring at a screen.
body:
Separated by distance, but together through shared word and thought.

Somewhere, you're reading this, even though we've never met. We can agree and fight and love and hate based on a few simple symbols transmitted through an electronic network. Take a moment to appreciate how marvelous that is, and remember that each of us is a person with hopes, dreams, needs and fears.

I love you, GD. And I mean that, I really do. Each and every one of you is dear to my heart. I may disagree with some of you, and sometimes I feel like some of you could spend your time doing something more than shitposting, but I wouldn't trade you. You're all part of this community.

With love,
GD's resident blacksmith
a stinky rat
